description: Concatenate first n squares in reverse order.
references: Mihaly Bencze [Beneze], L. Tutescu, Some Notions and Questions in Number Theory, Sequence 5.
links: Reinhard Zumkeller, Table of n, a(n) for n = 1..225
maple: P:=proc(i) local a,n; a:=1; print(1); for n from 2 by 1 to i do a:=n^2*10^floor(evalf(1+log10(a),1000))+a; print(a); od; end: P(100); - _Paolo P. Lava_, Jun 20 2008
mathematica: Join[{s = 1}, Table[s = FromDigits[Flatten[IntegerDigits[{n^2, s}]]], {n, 2, 12}]] (* _Jayanta Basu_, Jul 14 2013 *)
prog: (Haskell)a038397 n = a038397_list !! (n-1)a038397_list = f "" $ tail a000290_list where   f xs (q:qs) = (read ys :: Integer) : f ys qs     where ys = show q ++ xs-- _Reinhard Zumkeller_, Mar 01 2014
author: M. I. Petrescu (mipetrescu(AT)yahoo.com)
